ComicInfo.Summary: A mysterious fog of disbelief clouds Areala's eyes when she sees amongst a crowd a boy who bears an uncanny likeness to her dead friend Jason. Yet even though the boy appears to be Jason in visage, his cold soulless eyes say otherwise. The boy runs away when Areala calls out to him, and now she must follow the boy down a path that will lead her through the alleyways of New York and end in the shocking truth about what really happened to Jason.
